pr_title: Allow DefaultS3Presigner.Builder to take a custom S3Configuration

timeline.bodyText: Can we call this serviceConfiguration to match S3BaseClientBuilder#serviceConfiguration?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Why is disabling checksum validation required?
timeline.author: millems

replies.bodyText: This is just carrying forward the existing default this class was using on line 292. To be honest, I'm not real sure why it is set that way to begin with.
replies.author: scheerer

timeline.bodyText: Can we test all possible flags of S3Configuration?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.message: Allow DefaultS3Presigner.Builder to take a custom S3Configuration

timeline.bodyText:
Nice! Thanks for testing this.
For the other features:

pathStyleAccessEnabled, useArnRegionEnabled both affect the endpoint. If they're working, can we add a test for them? If they're not working, maybe we should throw an exception if they're configured.
chunkedEncodingEnabled and checksumValidationEnabled don't make sense for presigned requests right now. Can we add some javadoc to mention that they currently aren't used for presigning?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.message: Add S3Presigner tests to address useArnRegionEnabled; javadoc additions to note S3Configuration items that do not apply to presigning

timeline.bodyText: Can we include the javadoc here as well? I see you added it to the concrete implementation already.
timeline.author: millems
millems
